title: "The 5:22" by George Harrar
description: When a fellow passenger on his usual train goes missing, a man begins to wonder if everything is as it seems. Find more from the author at www.georgeharrarbooks.com. This episode is brought to you by Audible (audible.com/levar) and Tripping.com (www.tripping.com/LEVAR).
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
